title: You wanna gut Rengar? Fine. Take away all my damage. IDGAF just don't ship THIS
body: That is how you take an identity of a champion and just say "go die in a fire"

replies.body: The intended change is that Rengar gets put slightly further away from his target after landing. Looks like that's sometimes causing the game to put him in a spot that's on another side of a wall though, which definitely shouldn't be happening. Thanks for the linked video, will pass that on to the designer working on the Rengar changes.
I COULD FUCKING CRY. Someone in red has seen something important.

> [{quoted}](name=Spiffy,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=iuwcApAc,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2016-01-20T09:20:21.878+0000)
>
> I COULD FUCKING CRY. Someone in red has seen something important.

The important thing is how braindead no skill rengar is and his counterplay which he actually has NOW
Because bugs are counterplay right?
No, they aren't. They're bugs.
Seems like you and 4 other people don't know what sarcasm is.
Bug? What bug? All I see is the new Rengar that was reworked to be a Marksman.
Actually he takes a lot of skill. Ever seen the difference between a good and bad rengar?

> [{quoted}](name=WookieJesuz,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=iuwcApAc,comment-id=0003000000000001,timestamp=2016-01-21T01:05:35.316+0000)
>
> Actually he takes a lot of skill. Ever seen the difference between a good and bad rengar?

There is difference between good player and bad player in every champion(except garen),but to be a good rengar it takes as much as skill to be a good Annie-almost 0.

Don't bash Garen, it isn't easy to use passive in lane, to reach your enemies, to trade adequately against ranged laners.
He's still just a melee ball of stats. Just nerfed compared to prerework.

> [{quoted}](name=Photos of Ghosts,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=iuwcApAc,comment-id=000300000000000100000000,timestamp=2016-01-21T09:29:24.329+0000)
>
> Don't bash Garen, it isn't easy to use passive in lane, to reach your enemies, to trade adequately against ranged laners.
> He's still just a melee ball of stats. Just nerfed compared to prerework.

Garen is the literal easiest champion in the game,without even a single brain muscle needed.

Idk bro {{champion:106}} {{champion:36}} {{champion:23}} {{champion:421}} {{champion:5}}

There's definitely others on his level.
you forgot my old main{{champion:19}}
I had to play only him for several weeks in order to learn how not to go 1/8.

may I suggest taric? or singed?
walking simulators have been all the rage lately.
I kid :D garen's easy, but there's probably some strategy to him. I'm not gonna bash you for taking time to learn a champ.
[Fuck you :<](http://imgur.com/KjOtQJh)
Shame they aren't on many threads at all :P

WOW rengar gets attention instantly but Darius and his e not!!! 

http://plays.tv/video/5690eac2cf61ab3dba/darius-e-bug
That's not a bug, the e is supposed to bounce you off so that you are in range for Q heal.

And new rengar leap mechanic makes him land a bit away from his target. 

And darius e makes his targets land a bit away from him.

See the analogy?

no? typical...

> [{quoted}](name=DariusTheGreat,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=iuwcApAc,comment-id=0003000100000000,timestamp=2016-01-21T20:14:38.045+0000)
>
> And new rengar leap mechanic makes him land a bit away from his target. 
> 
> And darius e makes his targets land a bit away from him.
> 
> See the analogy?
> 
> no? typical...

What the crap are you talking about?  That ability has always worked like that.
You are gold and played darius twice in season5. Please shut up already and stop spreading false information.

> [{quoted}](name=DariusTheGreat,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=iuwcApAc,comment-id=000300010000000000000000,timestamp=2016-01-22T09:58:27.322+0000)
>
> You are gold and played darius twice in season5. Please shut up already and stop spreading false information.

Hahaha - what does being gold have to do with anything?  I'm proud of making gold, as I should be, as statistically it is well above average, especially for the number of ranked games I played last season.

You're wrong, and my rating has nothing to do with that.
TL;DR: Rengar is now a ranged champion.

> [{quoted}](name=Meddler,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=iuwcApAc,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2016-01-20T09:17:55.595+0000)
>
> The intended change is that Rengar gets put slightly further away from his target after landing. Looks like that's sometimes causing the game to put him in a spot that's on another side of a wall though, which definitely shouldn't be happening. Thanks for the linked video, will pass that on to the designer working on the Rengar changes.

Hey Meddleman, has the team noticed the bug where Rengar can hit Q with 5 points, throw an empowered E and still use the procced empowered Q all for 5 points? Is this intended?
Why did you guys go with the double-nerf instead of trying either the lower-burst or the higher warning range first?

You say bug, I say free ranged attacks. 
Adc Rengar? Adc Rengar.
Definitely not a nerf. People just have to adapt to changes /s
Change is good.{{champion:121}}
Kha'Zix likes this new feature. Probably because he wants Rengar to be stronger.
But Rengar's too strong.
Looks like one of those "Cat jump fails" video on youtube.

Hmm, would be a nice nerf doe to that passive of his:

> **Unseen Predator**

> Leaps can no longer go over walls :D (only ult can still go over walls)

wait can you not jump walls anymore with that....
HA.
HAHAHA.
i lold rito a shit.
Sad, was a pretty good nerf too.

For reporting bugs on the PBE, check out [**this post by RiotGrayswandir**](http://boards.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bugs/CF5EEDC8FF5AC1A896F517E2C7AE4650C472807F-how-to-report-bugs-on-the-pbe)!

EDIT: Mad props to Meddler!
Is it just me or is Wuks not showing as an arbiter?

> [{quoted}](name=Nauthes,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=iuwcApAc,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2016-01-20T16:11:14.806+0000)
>
> Is it just me or is Wuks not showing as an arbiter?

The Arbiters currently only appear as Arbiters within the Miscellaneous and Player Behavior & Moderation sub-boards :)
wait... how is he even dealing damage to his targets?

> [{quoted}](name=ZephyrDrake,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=iuwcApAc,comment-id=0015,timestamp=2016-01-21T00:34:56.362+0000)
>
> wait... how is he even dealing damage to his targets?

{{champion:44}} Magic rules these lands.

> [{quoted}](name=Spiffy,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=iuwcApAc,comment-id=,timestamp=2016-01-20T08:38:47.808+0000)
>
> That is how you take an identity of a champion and just say "go die in a fire"

No, Cassio's rework. That's how you take a champ's identity and say "go die in a fire".

While they're at it can they make it so that if the dash is blocked or dodged the target doesn't take damage it's pretty annoying to block the dash with something like a poppy w only to be left with a 20% health adc
Finally. He's balanced now so everyone is going to be mad.
This video had me giggling half way through. Worth?
Hahahahahahahahahahahaha

I have to ask, are you requesting that they don't change where he lands (which I'm okay with them not doing), or are you asking that they don't make it so his jump deals damage even if he can't cross over the wall. because that's the big problem I see in that video.
That looks funny
They should actually keep this and change his ulti to be the only one that goes through walls. To compensate they should increase e range+damage.

Lol it's like an old final fantasy game where you attack without moving close to the enemy.

Is it just me or did the raptors ignore the enemy and walked around to attack Reng? Is aggro not based on proximity any more?
